title: Chris Davis (baseball)
summary: Christopher Lyn Davis (born March 17, 1986), nicknamed "Crush Davis",  is an American former professional baseball first baseman. He played in Major League Baseball (MLB) for the Texas Rangers and Baltimore Orioles. He bats left-handed and throws right-handed. While primarily a first baseman throughout his career, Davis has also been a designated hitter, third baseman, and outfielder.
